name: Color Match
description:
Greetings! 

This is a game I started working on since the February of 2019 and it was originally intended for mobile. Since 2019 February I worked on it every now and then, but when it came to the finishing the game I experienced many issues with putting it on mobile I lost motivation mid-summer an since then I haven't touched the game.

But now I realized that since I worked on it for quite a while it might be worth it to upload it here. So here it is. Note that the game is quite incomplete since I didn't change anything since summer expect for the build settings. Sorry about the bugs!

|Controls :

Q - switch to red

W - switch to blue

E - switch to green

You can also click the buttons to switch colors.|

Thanks for playing!
